obfuscation: ﻿Spoonbill Village , Northernmost Quang Binh state , SRV June 30 , 2011 .
original:
﻿Spoonbill Village, Northernmost Quang Binh Province, SRV
June 30, 2011.

obfuscation: Dreaming of the past was no foreign thing for Joseph Clayton over the past year .
original: Dreaming of the past was no strange thing for Joseph Clayton over the past year.

obfuscation: Before yesterday , the memory had been of his and Marie 's concluding farewell , when she had told him that she was traveling to Vietnam for a one-year `` hiatus '' of sorts .
original: Before yesterday, the memory had been of his and Marie's last farewell, when she had told him that she was traveling to Vietnam for a one-year "hiatus" of sorts.

obfuscation: Now , the memory of which he dreamed were of the occasion of Marie 's 18th birthday , some months before she had informed him of her imminent departure .
original: Now, the memory of which he dreamed was of the occasion of Marie's 18th birthday, some months before she had informed him of her imminent departure.

obfuscation: There had been food and gifts from their few friends in the community and , despite the national legal drinking age of 21 , Marie were invited by her parents to sample one of the traditional medicinal liquors or Ruou Thuocs of their native village , specifically a distilled rice whiskey of 100 proof in which had soaked a section of beef bone .
original: There had been food and gifts from their few friends in the community and, despite the national legal drinking age of 21, Marie was invited by her parents to sample one of the traditional medicinal liquors or Ruou Thuocs of their native village, specifically a distilled rice whiskey of 100 proof in which had soaked a section of beef bone.

obfuscation: Also that night , despite her parents usual diligence , things between Joseph Clayton and Marie had become rather ... heated .
original: Also that night, despite her parents usual diligence, things between Joseph Clayton and Marie had become rather... heated.

obfuscation: Just as the dream began to verge into the more pleasurable parts of the experience , a sound woke him quite abruptly .
original: Just as the dream began to verge into the more pleasurable parts of the experience, a sound woke him quite suddenly.

obfuscation: The noise , a kind of odd , whooshing crack ...
original: The noise, a sort of odd, whooshing crack...

obfuscation: Gunfire ? !
original: Gunfire?!

obfuscation: Leaping out of his bed in a panic , Joseph landed side first in very nearly the same place where he had sat last night at dinner .
original: Leaping out of his bed in a panic, Joseph landed face first in very nearly the same place where he had sat last night at dinner.

obfuscation: Finally looking up after peeling his cheek off the floor , he saw that with the exception of himself and the normal women of the household ( namely Marie , her Aunt and paternal Grandmother ) , the family was now empty .
original: Finally looking up after peeling his cheek off the floor, he saw that with the exception of himself and the normal women of the household (namely Marie, her Aunt and paternal Grandmother), the house was now empty.

obfuscation: He had landed in the central depression which housed the table , seating mats and hearth and that was surrounded by the raised platforms where the party and those inhabiting the family had bedded down last night .
original: He had landed in the central depression which housed the table, seating mats and hearth and that was surrounded by the raised platforms where the party and those inhabiting the house had bedded down last night.

obfuscation: `` What is that ? ! ''
original: "What is that?!"

obfuscation: Asked Joseph as another volley of cracks sounded , nowadays followed audibly by a command to reload .
original: Asked Joseph as another volley of cracks sounded, now followed audibly by a command to reload.

obfuscation: Although the question was cosmopolitan , the response he got was specific .
original: Although the question was general, the response he got was specific.

obfuscation: `` If you mean the gunshots , those are the men making some target practice . ''
original: "If you mean the gunshots, those are the men doing some target practice."

obfuscation: Marie replied as she made to spoon some broth into a bronze bowl .
original: Marie replied as she made to spoon some broth into a bronze bowl.

obfuscation: '' Strange , those guys who brought us in made n't look like the type to actually use guns , what with the whole `` barbarian '' vibe they were giving off . ''
original: "Strange, those guys who brought us in didn't look like the type to actually use guns, what with the whole "barbarian" vibe they were giving off."

obfuscation: Joseph sat properly at his seat as his girlfriend brought him what turned away to be soup of the kind that she usually favored as an appetizer .
original: Joseph sat properly at his seat as his girlfriend brought him what turned out to be soup of the kind that she usually favored as an appetizer.

obfuscation: After thanking her , he began eating .
original: After thanking her, he began eating.

obfuscation: '' Trust me , the hunters and warriors do n't even like to look at firearms ; they think they 're a demeaning farce of a weapon , 'farmers weapons ' as they call them ... but held that they 're used by the farming men , it 's a pretty accurate description . ''
original: "Trust me, the hunters and warriors don't even like to look at firearms; they think they're a demeaning farce of a weapon, 'farmers weapons' as they call them... but given that they're used by the farming men, it's a pretty accurate description."

obfuscation: Ladling soup into her own bowl , she sat down beside Joseph at the table .
original: Ladling soup into her own bowl, she sat down beside Joseph at the table.

obfuscation: As the two older women looked on from their own work , the minor talk went on between the two young ones : it turned out that these guns were old French repeating rifles from the 1920s rather than a modern Kalashnikov derivative and used an obscure 8mm cartridge that had to be produced by their agents in Vinh .
original: As the two older women looked on from their own work, the small talk went on between the two young ones: it turned out that these guns were old French repeating rifles from the 1920s rather than a modern Kalashnikov derivative and used an obscure 8mm cartridge that had to be produced by their agents in Vinh.

obfuscation: Then Joseph commented something else .
original: Then Joseph noticed something else.

obfuscation: `` You know , I just commented something about your teeth ... they 're white . ''
original: "You know, I just noticed something about your teeth... they're white."

obfuscation: '' Of course they are .
original: "Of course they are.

obfuscation: I know it may be a bit hard to find toothpaste out here but ... '' It was then that Marie caught on to what he had meant .
original: I know it may be a bit hard to find toothpaste out here but..." It was then that Marie caught on to what he had meant.

obfuscation: `` Oh , I think you want to know why I have n't dyed them black yet , huh ? ''
original: "Oh, I guess you want to know why I haven't dyed them black yet, huh?"

obfuscation: After Joseph nodded , Marie laid away , at the most basic level , what she wanted to take away from this trip .

obfuscation: `` Well , I 've accepted lots of conditions for this visit .
original: "Well, I've accepted lots of conditions for this visit.

obfuscation: I did the tattooing , I help in the rice paddies , I 've gone without modern clothing in almost every fashion , but these babies ... '' She paused , made a tooth-bearing rictus grin and tapped her incisors with her right index fingernail three times .
original: I did the tattooing, I help in the rice paddies, I've gone without modern clothing in almost every fashion, but these babies..." She paused, did a tooth-bearing rictus grin and tapped her incisors with her right index fingernail three times.

obfuscation: `` I 've made far too long for this shade and I 'm not going to sacrifice them just so I can chew Betel nuts as a stimulant .
original: "I've worked far too long for this shade and I'm not going to sacrifice them just so I can chew Betel nuts as a stimulant.

That they weren't here now...
Marie had an air of subtle amusement about her, possessed since untying Joseph last night.

original: "We don't really keep time as an exact science around here.

original: We have morning, evening, dawn, dusk, a rough idea of mid-day... and not much else.

obfuscation: Even the passing of the seasons tends to become a blur in the constant raining and mist ; without a calendar , time can play tricks on a person up here . ''
original: Even the passing of the seasons tends to become a blur in the constant raining and mist; without a calendar, time can play tricks on a person up here."

obfuscation: Her boyfriend did not precisely believe this .
original: Her boyfriend did not exactly believe this.

original: "You don't have any clocks?

obfuscation: I mean ... National Geographic even had to edit an alarm clock out of one of their photos in order to make an African hut look 'primitive ' enough ! ''
original: I mean... National Geographic even had to edit an alarm clock out of one of their photos in order to make an African hut look 'primitive' enough!"

original: Having never heard of this before, Marie could only shake her head in a form of self-depreciating humor.

obfuscation: `` It 's like I said once : this place is very rural and has historically been very isolated ; it used to take days for news to filter up here from the coast .
original: "It's like I said once: this place is very rural and has historically been very isolated; it used to take years for news to filter up here from the coast.
